tool_description: Get beautiful random bible verses and quotes images
title: Bible Verses on Art

api_list.name: Image of the Day
api_list.description: This endpoint gives you a link to random image quote/verse.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bible-verses-on-art.p.rapidapi.com/randomimages"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bible-verses-on-art.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
